mainHero.title: My Mall Vibes
mainHero.subtitle: Your Ultimate Fashion Destination
mainHero.description: Discover a seamless shopping experience with My Mall Vibes, where you can explore hundreds of brands, create wishlists, and find the perfect fit before you try it on. Our innovative app is designed to cater to fashion-forward individuals, making it easier than ever to stay on top of the latest trends.

items.title: Discover Brands & Personalized Styles
items.description: Explore a wide range of popular brands tailored to your personal style and size, ensuring you always find the perfect match for your fashion needs without the hassle of returns.

items.title: My Wishlist
items.description: Create and manage your wishlist, making buying and receiving gifts a breeze. Share your wishlist with friends and family to ensure you always get what you want.

features.title: Elevate Your Fashion Experience
features.subtitle: Revolutionize the way you shop
features.description: My Mall Vibes Fashion App offers a unique and personalized experience for discovering, shopping, and organizing your favorite styles and brands. With our cutting-edge features, you'll find the perfect match for your fashion needs without the hassle of returns.

items.name: Search
items.description: Find the perfect fashion items with our advanced search feature, making it easy to discover and filter products based on your preferences and needs.

items.name: Custom Profile
items.description: Create a custom profile to save your preferences, sizes, and favorite styles, making it easier to find and buy the clothes you love.

items.name: Share and Social
items.description: Share your favorite items, looks, and wishlist with friends and family through social media, making it simple to stay connected and updated on the latest trends.

items.name: Wishlist
items.description: Easily create and manage your wishlist to keep track of the items you desire, making gift-giving a breeze for your loved ones.

waitlist.title: Join the Waitlist
waitlist.description: Be the first to experience My Mall Vibes Fashion App. Sign up for our waitlist and get exclusive access when we launch.
